rooms.description: Serves as entry point, reception area, with storage space for coats and shoes.
Open-plan living space blending traditional Mediterranean aesthetics with modern design. Adjacent to the kitchen and home theater.
Fully integrated into the living area with Mediterranean style cabinetry and a central island. Emphasis on natural light and connectivity with the dining area.
Dedicated room for multimedia entertainment with soundproofing, comfortable seating, and integrated projection screen.
Well-appointed bathroom near the living area with Vastu-aligned placements ensuring privacy and positive energy flow.
